text:
❝The vaccine should be tested on
   politicians first. If they survive, the
   vaccine is safe. If they don't, then
    the country is safe.❞
         •MONIKA WISNIEWSKA•
                  |Polish Author|
#coronavirus #vaccine #PfizerBioNTech #vaccinationCovid #COVID19 https://t.co/cFBM58g6Xy
